page.title: 18WANSFORD AREA WALKS
page.content: The rural area around the villages of Wansford and Yarwell is a perfect location for walkers. The landscape is almost flat, providing easy walking country, but it contains a wide variety of scenery which makes for interesting walks: The many footpaths which traverse the area take the walker across fields; through villages, forests and woodlands; beside quarries; near historic buildings, roman remains and ancient monuments; along river banks and across rivers by means of bridges, fords and stepping stones. In addition to the public footpaths there are also bridleways and many quiet country roads which provide a relatively traffic free environment for walkers.
